TODAY’S NEEDS PROVIDED FOR.—The truth of God received into the heart is able to make you wise unto salvation. In believing
94
and obeying it you will receive grace sufficient for the duties and trials of today. Grace for tomorrow you do not need. You should feel that you have only to do with today. Overcome for today; deny self for today; watch and pray for today; obtain victories in God for today.—(Testimonies for the Church, vol. 3, 333.)
